overview:
Alexander Tamas joined DST as a Partner in 2008 and established a presence for DST in London from where he is spearheading some of DSTâ€™s international efforts. Alexander serves on the Board of Forticom, one of the largest social networking companies globally, and on the Board of Mail.ru.

Prior to DST, Alexander worked in the Investment Banking Division of Goldman Sachs in London where he was responsible for numerous technology and Internet IPOs in Europe and Russia, mergers and acquisitions in the Internet and software sectors and fundraisings for high-growth companies across Europe.

Before Goldman Sachs, Alexander co-founded Arma Partners and helped to build it to one of Europeâ€™s leading independent technology m&a advisory firms with a presence in London and Silicon Valley.

Alexander holds a BA form the Catholic University of Eichstaett and a MA in Business, Finance and Accounting from the Goethe University, Frankfurt.

funding_round.source_description: Identified Hits 10M Users, Nabs $21M In Series B Funding
